member.name: M:HotelBookingSystem.Application.Services.GuestService.GetRecentlyVisitedHotelsAsync(System.Guid,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of unique recently visited hotels for a guest, presenting essential details.
member.param: The unique identifier of the guest for whom recently visited hotels are to be retrieved.
The maximum number of unique recently visited hotels to retrieve. Default is 5.
member.returns: An asynchronous task representing the operation, returning a collection of unique recently visited hotels.

remarks.para: This method asynchronously retrieves recent bookings associated with the specified guest, including information about the booked rooms and their respective hotels. It then maps the relevant details to a simplified hotels model, , for a cleaner representation of the data. The resulting collection provides essential information about the unique recently visited hotels, such as hotel name, city name, star rating, and price.

member.returns: An asynchronous task representing the operation, returning a collection of unique recently visited hotels.
